text: Iraq competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, South Korea. ==Results by event== ===Boxing=== Men's Flyweight (- 51 kg) * Amir Hussain *# First Round -- Lost to Gamal El-Komy (EGY), 1:4 === Football (soccer) === * Group Stage \---- \---- * Team Roster: :* Ahmad Jassim :* Adnan Dirjal :* Hassan Kamal :* Ghanim Oraibi :* Samir Shaker :* Habib Jafar :* Younis Abd Ali :* Ahmad Radhi :* Ismail Mohammed :* Hussein Saeed :* Saad Qais :* Karim Salman :* Karim Allawi :* Basil Gorgis :* Natiq Hashim :* Mudhafar Jabbar :* Laith Hussein :* Radhi Shenaishil :* Salam Hasim :* Emad Hashim * Head Coach: Ammo Baba ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1988 Summer Olympics 1988 Category:1988 in Iraqi sport
title: Iraq at the 1988 Summer Olympics
